channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Audio Station
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Audio Station

item.title: CVE-2022-27611|2024-09-16T16:58:23.582Z -- synology -- audio%20station
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology Audio Station before 6.5.4-3367 allows remote authenticated users to delete arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.
